p: As shown in Fig. 8, AcEO triggered a concentration-dependent vasodilation against Phen (1 μM) and K + (80 mM) induced vasocontractions, with respective EC 50 value of 0.005 mg/ml ( n = 6) and 0.019 mg/ml ( n = 6). In parallel, AcEO and verapamil administered in increasing doses to the plateau of K + (80 mM), showed a similar vasorelaxant profile with respective E max values of (97,04% + 4,08; n = 6) and (94,97% + 3,35; n = 6) (Fig. 9).
